Hi,

I have a superclass that implements a @BeforClass method. As I tryed
t=
o run the subclass test, all the setup stuff was OK, but then came
this exc=
eption with the no runnable method message.. The most weird
was that the st=
ack trace came from the test method (in the junit
plugin from eclipse IDE),=
 which is a runnable method!

I tryed then to make the superclass extend Te=
stCase and run it with
junit 3, and noticed that one non initialized attrib=
ute at the
superclass lead to a NullPointerException at the contructor and
=
somehow JUnit4 hides the exception and show only "no runnable
methods". Cou=
ld it be a problem?
